name: Point & Shoot
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 41. The theme was 'Combine 2 Incompatible Genres' so I thought I'd take the genre of point & click adventure games which I deeply love and smash it into another. 

Ladies and gentlemen, I give you a brand new game genre; the point & shoot adventure game.

Controls

WASD to move

Mouse to look and aim

Left Mouse Button to shoot
